sentence: Cynthia Lummis refuses to say who she's for, but Donald Trump, whom she lavishly praises, says she's for his anti-Cheney primary candidate, Harriet Hageman.
author: Albert Hunt
title: What do Republicans stand for?

sentence: That wasn't necessary for it to fulfill its purpose: To join the Wyoming GOP in designating Harriet Hageman, who is challenging Cheney in the August primary, as a Republican candidate entitled to party support.
title: The Trailer: Coming soon to a Democratic primary fight: Israel
